Things should Just Work.

You shouldn't have to write markdown in all of your entries. If you upload a plain html file, that also should Just Work, as if it were any other Entry.

And why shouldn't it?

This file is used to assert:

  • That plain .html files are loaded in as note-kind Entry, and not document kind
  • That the contents of this file should be part of the body atribute in the Entry object.
  • That the folder path becomes part of the identifier for an entry, and its url should be /2021/should-just-work.
